trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref>, source column name, and <xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"> </xref> för den angivna <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"> </xref>, källkolumnsnamnet, och <xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> exists in the collection, it is returned.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>finns i samlingen, returneras.</xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> does not exist in the collection, for a given <xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction>, the following actions occur: |MissingMappingAction|Action Taken| |--------------------------|------------------| |`Passthrough`|Creates a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> with the specified source column name as both the source column name and the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> column name.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>inte finns i samlingen för en given <xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction>sker följande åtgärder: | MissingMappingAction | Åtgärd | |--------------------------|------------------| | `Passthrough`| Skapar en <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>med det angivna kolumnnamnet som både källkolumnsnamnet och <xref:System.Data.DataSet>kolumnnamn.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> </xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> is not added to the collection.| |`Error`|An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is generated if the specified column mapping is missing.| |`Ignore`|Gets a null value.|
trans-unit.target: Den här <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>har inte lagts till i samlingen. | | `Error`| En <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>genereras om det angivna kolumnmappningen saknas. | | `Ignore`| Hämtar ett null-värde. |</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: Det kan användas endast när den <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection>instans omvandlas till ett <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>gränssnitt.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection>
